imdb.title: Yama no Susume: Next Summit
imdb.plot: While reminiscing about her journey so far, Aoi Yukimura finds herself eager to go mountaineering once more. A likely opportunity arises when Koharu Senjuin invites Aoi to check out the Mountaineering Club after school. As the hea...

episodes.title: 1st Season: Spring
episodes.plot: Aoi graduates from middle school and moves into her new home, unaware of her impending reunion with Hinata. This is followed by a recap of the first season.

episodes.title: 2nd season: Summer Part 1
episodes.plot: Hinata takes part in an obstacle race during the school's sports festival. This is followed by a recap of the first half of the second season.

episodes.title: 2nd season: Summer Part 2
episodes.plot: While shopping in Tokyo, Aoi and Hinata climb up Mt. Atago to pray at the Atago shrine. This is followed by a recap of the second half of the second season.

episodes.title: 3rd season: Autumn
episodes.plot: Aoi, Hinata and Kokona visit Fuji-Q Highland to ride the Fujiyama roller coaster. This is followed by a recap of the third season.

episodes.title: A Challenge from the Mountaineering Club!?/A Whip of Love on Mt. Buko?
episodes.plot: Aoi is invited to check out the Mountaineering Club, which both Hinata and Kaede declined to join. On the weekend, Aoi and her mother go with Hinata to climb Mt. Buko in Chichibu.

episodes.title: Hikari's Big Date Plans!/Together For a White Christmas!
episodes.plot: Hikari invites Aoi to spend the day with her at Naguri Lake in Hanno, where they go for a canoe ride together. On Christmas Eve, Aoi invites everyone over for a Christmas party only to get suddenly called into work to help sell Christmas cakes.

episodes.title: Where to Watch The First Sunrise/Hiking With Classmates!
episodes.plot: Aoi, Hinata and Kokona climb up Mt. Hiwada in Hidaka together to watch the first sunrise of the year. Later, Aoi and Hinata join Kasumi, Mio and Yuri on a temple visit on Mt. Takao.

episodes.title: Valentine's Day at a Power Spot?/Challenge Snowshoeing!
episodes.plot: On the weekend before Valentine's Day, Honoka takes a break from her exam studies to join Aoi, Hinata and Kokona up Mt. Mitake to visit some power spots. On another day, Honoka joins Aoi and Hinata again, along with Koharu, to try out snowshoes on Mt. Akagi.

episodes.title: Mountain Stream Fishing - The Meaning of Life?/Off to Kamakura With Hinata's Family!
episodes.plot: Aoi's father brings Aoi, Hinata and Kokona along to a fishing lodge to try out mountain stream fishing. Later, Hinata's workaholic mother brings Aoi along on a family trip to Kamakura.

episodes.title: A New Season
episodes.plot: With the school year drawing to a close and Aoi worrying about ending up in a different class from Hinata, she somehow ends up taking her entire class up Mt. Tenran to take a commemorative photo.

episodes.title: We Meet Again, Mount Fuji!
episodes.plot: Aoi makes plans to challenge Mt. Fuji again with everyone during the summer break, getting feedback on the others on what route to take. Later, following a suggestion from Koharu, Aoi goes shopping for a new hiking backpack. On the day of the trek, Aoi is concerned about the weather, along with the possibility to getting altitude sickness again, but her friends encourage her to remain positive.

episodes.title: Onward! To a New Summit
episodes.plot: Aoi and her friends begin their hike up Mt. Fuji.
